summary: Completed comprehensive testing of JobFill AI Chrome Extension Dashboard. All backend APIs (25 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all 5 pages load correctly with proper navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: Chrome extension code (content.js) has comprehensive smart navigation and stuck state UI features implemented correctly
Backend API endpoints are well-structured with proper error handling
Frontend uses proper environment variable for API URL (REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL)
All interactive elements have proper styling and are clickable
seed_data_creation: Test application created and deleted during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend dashboard fully functional. Chrome extension code has been enhanced with smart navigation, stuck state UI, and custom Yes/No button detection. Extension cannot be tested in this environment as it requires manual Chrome installation.

dashboard.details: Stats cards, charts, recent applications list all display correctly

profile.details: Personal info, work experience, education, skills, certifications all display and are editable

settings.details: AI provider dropdown, supported platforms toggles, typing speed settings all present

extension.details: Download button works, installation instructions displayed, extension features listed

applications.details: Application list, search, filters, add/export buttons all functional

api_health.details: Returns healthy status with service info

chrome_extension_notes: The Chrome extension code in /app/chrome-extension/content.js has been enhanced with: STATE machine for intelligent navigation, showStuckPanel() for user guidance when confused, smartNavigate() to find Apply buttons, findApplyButton() with pattern matching, handleCustomYesNo() for styled div buttons, findAriaRadioGroups() for ARIA-based radio groups. These features cannot be tested automatically as they require loading the extension in an actual Chrome browser.
